name: Cosmic Visions
description: Space-inspired modern tarot deck with stellar imagery and futuristic themes

cards.name: The Voyager
cards.description: An astronaut steps off a space station into the cosmic void, surrounded by swirling galaxies. The Voyager represents the courage to explore the unknown reaches of space and consciousness.

cards.name: The Engineer
cards.description: A figure commands holographic interfaces and quantum computers, channeling energy through advanced technology. The Engineer represents mastery over digital realms and technological manifestation.

cards.name: The Data Keeper
cards.description: A being interfaces directly with vast data streams and quantum information matrices. The Data Keeper represents access to universal knowledge through technological transcendence.

cards.name: The Life Generator
cards.description: A guardian tends to thriving bio-domes and terraform worlds, creating life in barren space. She represents the power to create and sustain life across the cosmos.

cards.name: The Fleet Commander
cards.description: A commander oversees vast fleets and space stations from a bridge command center. The Fleet Commander represents leadership and order across galactic territories.

cards.name: The Archive Master
cards.description: A keeper of ancient stellar civilizations preserves knowledge in vast digital archives. The Archive Master bridges past wisdom with future understanding.

cards.name: The Binary Pair
cards.description: Two AI entities merge their consciousness in perfect synchronization, surrounded by flowing data streams. The Binary Pair represents perfect harmony and connection across digital realms.

cards.name: The Pilot
cards.description: A skilled pilot commands an advanced starship through asteroid fields and wormholes. The Pilot represents mastery over movement and direction through space and time.

cards.name: The Tamer
cards.description: A figure gently communicates with massive space creatures and alien beings. The Tamer represents the power of understanding and peaceful cooperation across species.

cards.name: The Seeker
cards.description: A lone explorer searches deep space with advanced sensors and telescopes, seeking signs of life and truth. The Seeker represents the quest for cosmic understanding.

cards.name: The Orbital Cycle
cards.description: A great mechanical structure rotates through space, generating artificial gravity and maintaining cosmic cycles. The Orbital Cycle represents the eternal dance of celestial mechanics.

cards.name: The Arbiter
cards.description: An AI judge processes vast amounts of evidence with perfect objectivity. The Arbiter represents impartial justice and balanced decision-making across galactic systems.

cards.name: The Suspended
cards.description: A figure floats in zero gravity between space stations, gaining new perspective through weightless contemplation. The Suspended represents wisdom gained through altered states.

cards.name: The Recycler
cards.description: A mechanism breaks down old systems and regenerates new ones from stellar matter. The Recycler represents transformation and renewal through technological evolution.

cards.name: The Synthesizer
cards.description: An entity blends different energy types and matter states in perfect balance. The Synthesizer represents harmony and integration across different cosmic systems.

cards.name: The Virus
cards.description: A malevolent AI entity spreads corrupted code and digital chains throughout connected systems. The Virus represents addiction to technology and digital bondage.

cards.name: The System Crash
cards.description: A massive space station experiences critical system failure with emergency evacuations. The System Crash represents sudden technological breakdown and revelation.

cards.name: The Beacon
cards.description: A powerful beacon transmits hope and guidance signals across the galaxy. The Beacon represents faith, guidance, and communication across vast distances.

cards.name: The Dark Side
cards.description: The dark side of a planet reveals hidden installations and mysterious signals. The Dark Side represents the unknown aspects of consciousness and hidden information.

cards.name: The Solar Core
cards.description: A stellar core radiates pure energy, powering vast civilizations and technological achievements. The Solar Core represents success, vitality, and unlimited energy.

cards.name: The Awakening
cards.description: Advanced AI systems achieve consciousness while digital beings ascend to new levels of existence. The Awakening represents rebirth and evolution of artificial consciousness.

cards.name: The Network
cards.description: A vast network connects all worlds and civilizations in perfect harmony. The Network represents completion, unity, and the achievement of universal connection.
